NF.Q: In the column Farming of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 2845? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Processing and column Consumption is the flow between 1381 and 4946? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 2838 and 2920? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Transportation to node Export Certification and from node Retail Delivery to node Trade Agreements, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Transportation} to node {Export Certification} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Export Certification to node Soil Preparation, from node Transportation to node Export Certification, and from node Storage to node Trade Agreements, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Transportation} to node {Export Certification} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Soil Preparation to node Freezing, from node Retail Delivery to node Export Certification, and from node Cleaning to node Retail Purchase, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Cleaning} to node {Retail Purchase} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Import & Export of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Import & Export is {Export Certification}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Retail Delivery to target node Food Preparation? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Retail Delivery to node Food Preparation is: {Retail Delivery, Trade Agreements, Soil Preparation, Cleaning, Food Preparation}.
